title: Area of the basement used exclusively for parking and other ancillary uses as permitted in Regulation No
clause_text: Area of the basement used exclusively for parking and other ancillary uses as permitted in Regulation No. 37(7) (iv) (b, c, d, e & j). Area of covered parking spaces as provided in sub-Regulation (6) (a)of Regulation No.44
